name: Home Grown
description:
Home Grown explores the feeling of home in the form of growing and caring for your own garden. I wanted to demonstrate a feeling of home through the idea of 'Nurture by Nature', which relates to our individual experiences of growing up having great ramifications on who we are and how we act in different spaces. Home Grown depicts this in the form of the player going through the actions of growing a garden. I decided on the idea of looking after a garden because gardening is an explicit set of narrow rules that allows the creation of your own unique space. By working on their personalised garden, the player creates a familiar space that feels like home.

Game Credits:

Nicholas Staracek - Game Designer, Audio, and Additional Code - Website

Zoe Lovatt - Graphic Design - Website

Rebecca Owen - Animation - Website

Change log for Version 1.4 includes (latest):

  • Short introductory tutorial on first day cycle
  • Controls Menu updated with correct information
  • Particle effect updates
  • Exit application button, located on main menu

Change log for Version 1.3 included:

  • Full keyboard and mouse support for Windows and Mac
  • Full game pad support for Windows
  • Bug fixes
  • Audio tweaking
  • New baked lighting system
